meanings.definition: A small shorebird with a white underbelly and dark back.
meanings.sent1: The sanderlings scurried along the shoreline, searching for tiny creatures to eat.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a group of sanderlings running in and out of the waves at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The sanderlings held a race to see who could find the most delicious snacks first.
meanings.sent4: The sanderlings moved like a synchronized dance troupe along the sandy shore.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, the sanderlings painted the beach with their quick movements.
